name: The Perfect Place
description:
Find the perfect place to live the rest of your life as a tree in this short 3d surreal video game. 

Your goal is to reach the end of the level before you turn into a tree, to do this avoid direct sunlight (because sun is good for trees) and rest near other trees (because the roots consume all the nutrients from the soil).

I made this game in 3 days for the third wowie game jam. Most assets I got for free from the unreal engine's marketplace. I made the main character for a previous proyect of mine, but I edited and animated it for this game.

There is not much more to add, play the game and any feedback, comments, critics, questions, are welcomed.

Controls:

  1. WASD: move
  2. Space bar: sprint
  3. Left mouse: say hello (not of any use)
  4. right mouse: throw apple (you can hold to know the direction it will go)
  5. ESC/Enter: pause/main menu

You can lower the graphics from the menu if it goes slow for you.
